parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('htmlHeader')}

Power Automate

Auto-Archive .

As a reminder, you approved removal of this flow from the tenant on @{outputs('Date_Approved')}.
The flow will therefore be removed from the tenant sometime after @{outputs('Date_to_Delete')},

Flow Environment: @{items('Create_Archival_Request_for_Each_')?['admin_flowenvironmentdisplayname']}
Flow Display Name: @{body('See_if_Flow_Still_Exists')['properties']['displayName']}

If you want to retain a copy of this flow for later restore in the event that you change your mind, please do so now.
If you would like to stop recieving these reminders ahead of deletion, please delete on your side, and you will not be prompted again.

Thank you for using the Power Platform!
parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Reminder to back up your Flow: @{body('See_if_Flow_Still_Exists')['properties']['displayName']}
